title: Ep. 489 The Media is Ignoring These Important Developments
description:
In this episode I address the problems with the GOP Obamacare replacement bill and some economically sensible fixes.    I also discuss some serious allegations against Bernie Sanders and his wife that the media is ignoring.  https://www.cnbc.com/amp/2017/06/24/bernie-sanders-and-his-wife-reportedly-lawyer-up-amid-fbi-probe.html   Finally, I address the exploding fake news scandal at CNN and its impact on their coverage of the Trump administration. http://www.breitbart.com/big-government/2017/06/25/very-fake-news-scandal-cnn-jeff-zucker-network-flack-refuse-to-comment-russia-retraction/   
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
